code: import{API_DOMAIN}from'../constants';import{isDevelopmentOrTest}from'../utils/commonFunctions';import i18n from'i18next';import LanguageDetector from'i18next-browser-languagedetector';import Backend from'i18next-http-backend';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';var DEBUG=false;i18n.use(Backend).use(LanguageDetector).use(initReactI18next).init({debug:isDevelopmentOrTest()&&DEBUG,keySeparator:false,returnEmptyString:false,fallbackLng:'english',load:'languageOnly',backend:{loadPath:"".concat(API_DOMAIN,"/locales/locale_{{lng}}.json"),addPath:'http://localhost:9999/'},saveMissing:isDevelopmentOrTest()&&DEBUG,interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
